actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.5600.

official_title: A bill to revise and extend the block grant program under title XIX of the Public Health Service Act for preventive health services.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Block Grants) of the Public Health Service Act to authorize preventive health services appropriations for FY 1985 through 1987. Increases minimum population-based State allotments from $3000 to $3500. Bases a State's post-FY 1984 hypertension allotments upon 65 percent of its total preventive health services project grant amounts. Requires States to collect by October 1, 1984, specified preventive health services data.

titles.title: A bill to revise and extend the block grant program under title XIX of the Public Health Service Act for preventive health services.
